## Game.run() method

Called exactly once by a host to run a game.

**Signature:**

```typescript
run(players: IPlayerConfig[], onUpdateViews?: {
        (gameViews: GameView[]): void;
    }): Promise<IGameResult>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  players | [IPlayerConfig](./bge-core.iplayerconfig.md)<!-- -->\[\] | Information about who's playing. |
|  onUpdateViews | { (gameViews: [GameView](./bge-core.gameview.md)<!-- -->\[\]): void; } | _(Optional)_ Callback that will be invoked when the game renders a new view for each player. |

**Returns:**

Promise&lt;[IGameResult](./bge-core.igameresult.md)<!-- -->&gt;
